Load and Modify Image ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} skyline <- magick::image_read(here::here("materials", "exercises", "img", "rstudioconf-washington-bg.png")) skyline ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](05_annotations_ex2_solution_files/figure-revealjs/read-skyline-1.png){width=346} ::: ::: ## Create a Blue Dot ::: {.cell output-location='column'} ```{.r .cell-code code-line-numbers="3,4,5,6,7,8,9|3|7,8|9"} library(tidyverse) ggplot(mapping = aes(x = 0, y = 0)) + geom_point( color = "#71a5d4", size = 150 ) + xlim(-5, 5) + ylim(-5, 5) + theme_void() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](05_annotations_ex2_solution_files/figure-revealjs/annotations-exercise-2-1-1.png){width=1500} ::: ::: ## Add the "R" ::: {.cell output-location='column'} ```{.r .cell-code code-line-numbers="5,6,7,8,9,10"} ggplot(mapping = aes(x = 0, y = 0)) + geom_point( color = "#71a5d4", size = 150 ) + geom_text( label = "R", size = 80, family = "Tabular", color = "white" ) + xlim(-5, 5) + ylim(-5, 5) + theme_void() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](05_annotations_ex2_solution_files/figure-revealjs/annotations-exercise-2-2-1.png){width=1500} ::: ::: ## Add the rstudio::conf Skyline ::: {.cell output-location='column'} ```{.r .cell-code code-line-numbers="2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9,10|2,3"} ggplot(mapping = aes(x = 0, y = 0)) + annotation_custom( grid::rasterGrob( image = skyline, x = .5, y = .5 ) ) + geom_point( color = "#71a5d4", size = 150 ) + geom_text( label = "R", size = 80, family = "Tabular", color = "white" ) + xlim(-5, 5) + ylim(-5, 5) + theme_void() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](05_annotations_ex2_solution_files/figure-revealjs/annotations-exercise-2-3-1.png){width=1500} ::: ::: ## Position the rstudio::conf Skyline ::: {.cell output-location='column'} ```{.r .cell-code code-line-numbers="6,18"} ggplot(mapping = aes(x = 0, y = 0)) + annotation_custom( grid::rasterGrob( image = skyline, x = .5, y = .1 ) ) + geom_point( color = "#71a5d4", size = 150 ) + geom_text( label = "R", size = 80, family = "Tabular", color = "white" ) + xlim(-5, 5) + ylim(-7.5, 5) + theme_void() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](05_annotations_ex2_solution_files/figure-revealjs/annotations-exercise-2-4-1.png){width=1500} ::: ::: ## Position the rstudio::conf Skyline ::: {.cell output-location='column'} ```{.r .cell-code code-line-numbers="6,17,21,22,23"} ggplot(mapping = aes(x = 0, y = 0)) + annotation_custom( grid::rasterGrob( image = skyline, x = .5, y = -.2 ) ) + geom_point( color = "#71a5d4", size = 150 ) + geom_text( label = "R", size = 80, family = "Tabular", color = "white" ) + coord_cartesian(clip = "off") + xlim(-5, 5) + ylim(-5, 5) + theme_void() + theme( plot.margin = margin(t = 30, b = 120) ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](05_annotations_ex2_solution_files/figure-revealjs/annotations-exercise-2-5-1.png){width=1500} ::: ::: ## Change Background Color ::: {.cell output-location='column'} ```{.r .cell-code code-line-numbers="21,22,23"} ggplot(mapping = aes(x = 0, y = 0)) + annotation_custom( grid::rasterGrob( image = skyline, x = .5, y = .1 ) ) + geom_point( color = "#71a5d4", size = 150 ) + geom_text( label = "R", size = 80, family = "Tabular", color = "white" ) + xlim(-5, 5) + ylim(-7.5, 5) + theme_void() + theme( plot.background = element_rect( fill = "#fffdf9", color = "#fffdf9" ) ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](05_annotations_ex2_solution_files/figure-revealjs/annotations-exercise-2-6-1.png){width=1500} ::: ::: ## Save the Plot ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ggsave(here::here("exercises", "plots", "05_annotations_ex2.png"), width = 5, height = 6, dpi = 300) ``` ::: ![](plots/05_annotations_ex2.png){fig-align="center" fig-alt="The final logo with an aspect ratio of 5 x 6 inches."} :::footer ::: ## Or: Combine Images with {magick} ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} g <- ggplot(mapping = aes(x = 0, y = 0)) + geom_point(color = "#71a5d4", size = 150) + geom_text( label = "R", size = 80, family = "Tabular", color = "white" ) + theme_void() + theme(plot.background = element_rect(fill = "#fffdf9", color = "#fffdf9")) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ggsave(plot = g, filename = here::here("exercises", "img", "rstudio-dot.png"), width = 5, height = 5, dpi = 3600) ``` ::: ## Or: Combine Images with {magick} ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code code-line-numbers="3,4,5,6|1|3|4,5|6"} library(magick) dot <- image_read(here::here("exercises", "img", "rstudio-dot.png")) img <- c(dot, skyline) img <- image_append(image_scale(img, "1500"), stack = TRUE) image_write(img, path = here::here("exercises", "plots", "05_annotations_ex2_combined.png"), format = "png") ``` ::: ------------------------------------------------------------------------ ![](plots/05_annotations_ex2_combined.png){fig-align="center" fig-alt="The final logo, combined with ImageMagick."} :::footer :::

<script>
  // htmlwidgets need to know to resize themselves when slides are shown/hidden.
  // Fire the "slideenter" event (handled by htmlwidgets.js) when the current
  // slide changes (different for each slide format).
  (function () {
    function fireSlideChanged(previousSlide, currentSlide) {

      // dispatch for htmlwidgets
      const event = window.document.createEvent("Event");
      event.initEvent("slideenter", true, true);
      window.document.dispatchEvent(event);

      // dispatch for shiny
      if (window.jQuery) {
        if (previousSlide) {
          window.jQuery(previousSlide).trigger("hidden");
        }
        if (currentSlide) {
          window.jQuery(currentSlide).trigger("shown");
        }
      }
    }

    // hookup for reveal
    if (window.Reveal) {
      window.Reveal.addEventListener("slidechanged", function(event) {
        fireSlideChanged(event.previousSlide, event.currentSlide);
      });
    }

    // hookup for slidy
    if (window.w3c_slidy) {
      window.w3c_slidy.add_observer(function (slide_num) {
        // slide_num starts at position 1
        fireSlideChanged(null, w3c_slidy.slides[slide_num - 1]);
      });
    }

  })();
</script>
